00030 /**
00031  * Class for the flexform 'section' field
00032  *
00033  * @author      Jean-David Gadina <macmade@eosgarden.com>
00034  * @version     1.0
00035  * @package     TYPO3
00036  * @subpackage  oop
00037  */
00038 class tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section extends tx_oop_Flexform_Field
00039 {
00040     /**
00041      * The type of the field
00042      */
00043     protected $_fieldType = 'array';
00044     
00045     /**
00046      * The elements (types) of the section
00047      */
00048     protected $_elements  = array();
00049     
00050     /**
00051      * 
00052      */
00053     public function addFieldXmlObject( SimpleXMLElement $el )
00054     {
00055         $name                             = $this->_name;
00056         $el->$name->type                  = $this->_fieldType;
00057         $el->$name->section               = 1;
00058         $el->$name->tx_templavoila->title = 'LLL:'
00059                                           . $this->_langFile
00060                                           . ':'
00061                                           . $this->_sheetName
00062                                           . '.'
00063                                           . $this->_name;
00064         $subEl                            = $el->$name->addChild( 'el' );
00065         
00066         foreach( $this->_elements as $key => $value ) {
00067             
00068             $value->addElementXmlObject( $subEl );
00069         }
00070     }
00071     
00072     /**
00073      * Adds an element to the section
00074      * 
00075      * @param   string                                  The name of the element
00076      * @return  tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Element   The flexform section element object
00077      * @throws  tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Exception If the element already exists
00078      */
00079     public function addElement( $name )
00080     {
00081         // Checks if the field already exists
00082         if( isset( $this->_elements[ $name ] ) ) {
00083             
00084             // The field already exists
00085             throw new tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Exception(
00086                 'The element \'' . $name . '\' already exists. Please use the ' . __CLASS__ . '::getElement() method instead.',
00087                 tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Exception::EXCEPTION_ELEMENT_ALREADY_EXISTS
00088             );
00089         }
00090         
00091         // Creates the field object
00092         $this->_elements[ $name ] = new tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Element( $name, $this->_name, $this->_sheetName, $this->_langFile );
00093         
00094         // Returns the field
00095         return $this->_elements[ $name ];
00096     }
00097     
00098     /**
00099      * Gets a element from the section
00100      * 
00101      * @param   string                                  The name of the element
00102      * @return  tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Element   The flexform section element object
00103      * @throws  tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Exception If the element does not exists
00104      */
00105     public function getElement( $name )
00106     {
00107         // Checks if the field exists
00108         if( isset( $this->_elements[ $name ] ) ) {
00109             
00110             // Returns the field
00111             return $this->_elements[ $name ];
00112         }
00113         
00114         // No such field
00115         throw new tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Exception(
00116             'The requested element does not exist (' . $name . '). You should first add it with the ' . __CLASS__ . '::addElement() method.',
00117             tx_oop_Flexform_Field_Section_Exception::EXCEPTION_NO_ELEMENT
00118         );
00119     }
00120 }
